product_name: Wilderness Systems Tsunami 165 Kayak with Rudder
long_description: More than capable for a weekend trip, this touring kayak has added depth suitable for mid-to-larger sized paddlers while maintaining speed and efficiency necessary for longer distances.
short_description: More than capable for a weekend trip, this touring kayak has added depth suitable for mid-to-larger sized paddlers while maintaining speed and efficiency necessary for longer distances.
